story.text: Our aim is to set up a flexible member based organisation through which we can structure international partnerships with as far as possible minimal and automated accountancy using internal software mediated mechanisms such as currency systems that account for soft contributions as well as hard contributions.

story.text:
# Topics

1. [[Learning Garden]]
1. [[No Exams]]
1. [[No Sylabus]]
1. [[No teachers]] and [[No schools]]

# Audio Notes

Some audio notes to be transcribed, commented on, mangled, and then re-uploaded into podcasts on the topic of sustainably financing academies.

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077844-outlandish-sustainable-learning-model.mp3
An initial audio note on how to structure and finance the Outlandish Academy.  Start  of an open research project on creating alternative business models - [https://audioboom.com/posts/6077844-outlandish-sustainable-learning-model audioboom]

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting.mp3
An audio note on how we might set about an accounting system for the Outlandish Academy which takes into "account" more than just money - [https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting audioboom]

item.text: Our aim is to set up a flexible member based organisation through which we can structure international partnerships with as far as possible minimal and automated accountancy using internal software mediated mechanisms such as currency systems that account for soft contributions as well as hard contributions.
Initially we will bootstrap this structure by creating an LLP which has member ship organisations that are easily structured as One click organise or Loomio groups.
We need to build our capacity with regarding to accounting and finance.

My proposal is that we do this as a separate project on "community accounting" which both advised tool creation internally as well as creates its own podcast and MOOC, as do other [[Thought Garden]] productions.
Initially we will bootstrap this structure by creating an LLP which has member ship organisations that are easily structured as a [[OneclickOrg]] or [[Loomio]] groups.
An initial audio note on how to structure and finance the Outlandish Academy.  Start  of an open research project on creating alternative business models.

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077844-outlandish-sustainable-learning-model.mp3
This recording was made near [[ ]],  by [[fortyfoxes]], on  Jul 5, 2017 at 8:37 AM - [https://audioboom.com/posts/6077844-outlandish-sustainable-learning-model audioboom]
# Audio Notes An initial audio note on how to structure and finance the Outlandish Academy.  Start  of an open research project on creating alternative business models.
# Audio Notes An initial audio note on how to structure and finance the Outlandish Academy.  Start  of an open research project on creating alternative business models.

# Audio Notes

An initial audio note on how to structure and finance the Outlandish Academy.  Start  of an open research project on creating alternative business models.

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting.mp3
.

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting.mp3
An audio note on how we might set about an accounting system for the Outlandish Academy which takes into "account" more than just money.

https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting.mp3
An audio note on how we might set about an accounting system for the Outlandish Academy which takes into "account" more than just money - [https://audioboom.com/posts/6077877-outlandish-community-accounting audioboom]
